Reviews.Title: Terrific Camera!
Reviews.Author: yosef weiss
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. Not only is the quality of pictures is awesome, but it has dozens of different modes of pictures and movies. It is very quick. Unlike my other cameras which were more expensive then this, this camera adjusts focus instantly when moving and zooming. Stabilizer is great even for shaky hands. Not to mention this Projector. I mean a projector in camera??? what will they think of next. It is a great quality projector for this price. This is a great party trick and the projection can get really big - like a big screen tv.I love this camera more then any of the cameras Ive had before!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: abrandt
Reviews.Content: I have been needing a Pico projector and a Camera and WOW I found this.. For the $99 price it is soooo worth it and  even would have considered it at it's $300 price. Takes great pics and movies.. I have not tried to put my own movies on it yet and hope it plays them well too. The only drawback is it only supports 16g SD cards :( wish it would upto 64g.. It doesnt weigh anymore than any other camera I have ever had it is actually lighter IMO.. Great size easy to navigate all in all very surprised at this unique camera..

Reviews.Title: Very Cool, but not Very Clear
Reviews.Author: "unknown"
Reviews.Content: I am a total beginner and thought this would be a good entry level camera to take more interesting photos than a phone can. I find that the zoom is much better than what I have on my camera but close up pictures are comparable or worse (I have a pretty cheap 8mp camera phone and don't use it that much). Unfortunately, many of the pictures of even slow-moving subjects (like my pet cat) were blurry, even on the modes that were designed to take pictures of moving subjects. This is incredibly frustrating. I don't know if someone more experienced would be able to better control the camera.The projection feature was indeed very cool and quite a bit of fun (the cats were perplexed by the images of themselves lol!) but too blurry to really show off any pictures. It's still a really cool feature and the main reason I chose this camera over others and while I wasn't expecting it to be as sharp as the advertising images, it didn't come even close. Disappointing but still an interesting feature.The reason I ultimately returned it is because it didn't charge in the wall. First I tried the wall charger from the box which is actually designed to charge the fan to cool the projector when in use and so it comes with an extender cord that can plug into the camera (the fan has a circular input, the camera has a USB-like input). This did not work at all, I would see it flash quickly from blue battery icon, which I assume means charge, to the red low battery icon because the extender cord was obviously not well connected. Then I tried plugging the USB cord into a USB charger and it would display a loading bar and then said "Connection Failed." The only place it would charge was my computer. This is inconvenient since I don't leave the computer running all night and it's quite bulky to keep attached to a laptop during the day. For the short time I did charge it, it seemed to have decent battery life. If you keep your computer on all night, I guess this wouldn't be an issue for you.Overall, the camera seems okay and the projection is fun but there were too many issues for me to continue with it.

Reviews.Title: A great product especially the projector function
Reviews.Author: Thanapat Jindavanich "Poppuhaha"
Reviews.Content: It is great for my work because I didn't have to carry with me a big projector to give a presentation at customer's site anymore. The reason I gave this camera 4 stars because the auto focus is not as good as that of Nikon.

Reviews.Title: cool projection.  works pretty easily
Reviews.Author: E. Cavaness
Reviews.Content: cool projection right on the wall!.  works pretty easily.  like the NO flash option that is easy to set. glad I purchased.

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. J. McCann
Reviews.Content: I liked the performance of this camera.  The zoom was not as powerful as my 10 year old Fuji, but it still worked very well.  The quality of the pictures was great.  Some pictures came out as shaky, but that was my fault.  I bought additional batteries, as this requires special batteries, so I can't just carry a pack of AA batteries with me.  Overall I am pleased.  I have not tried the projector feature yet.

Reviews.Title: Pico projector is great! Price is too!
Reviews.Author: Dave A Stadtmiller
Reviews.Content: Pico projector is amazing. No sound on the videos though? Takes decent pictures. For the price definitely a buy just to do slide shows anywhere on anything. Works well even in somewhat bright conditions.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Genaro Rubio
Reviews.Content: Is does what is supposed to do. It has many functions for different scenes, such as fireworks, sunsets, moving objects and many more. My only "complaint" is that the volume one the camera is a little too low, when watching it other than that it is great.

Reviews.Title: Actually works
Reviews.Author: Tacitus "Cyclist"
Reviews.Content: So this thing actually works as advertised - we got it for the pico projector so that we could do stenciling on the wall. Pico projector is, as you would imagine, dim in broad daylight, but acceptable at night if it's the only thing in the room. The included software installed without incident and displays our Windows 8.1 desktop onto the thing. Haven't really used its camera functionality - but it works, certainly.

Reviews.Title: Projection Camera
Reviews.Author: James G. Morby
Reviews.Content: Little heavier then I wanted, Have to zoom slowly in Video mode to prevent blurring, otherwise camera is satisfactory Do like the projection feature.

Reviews.Title: stay away
Reviews.Author: Christopher R. Lock
Reviews.Content: Book this camera is a lot of hope for technology bundled into a cheap product. It is digital zoom YIKES! Plus the menu for the camera is not even legible in projector mode. I could not make out any picture this thing should have never made it to manufacturing.

Reviews.Title: battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The battery won't hold a charge, I called the 800# and they said they would replace it. It's been two wks and no battery. Maybe I should send the hold camera back?

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Emma Ware "divabetic"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he was blown away. He absolutely loved it.  The camera has so many amazing features and for the price it was a steal. And despite the holiday shipping rush, it arrived on schedule. I love Amazon

Reviews.Title: pico camera
Reviews.Author: Buster
Reviews.Content: The camera is great.However,the video has hardly any sound on playback!!Very disappointed in that.At full volume, you have to hold it up to your ear to hear it.Needs improvement on that!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1MP camera with 7x optical zoom
3 Inch auto LCD Screen
Approximately 18 MB internal storage with SD Card / SDHC Card support up to 16 GB
Optical image stabilization, face auto exposure, auto scene, and 3200 ISO
Camera works as a PICO projector, connect your computer to your camera and display up to 70 Inches diagonally
ProductInfo.Name: GE PJ1 14.1MP Digital Camera and PICO Projector with 7X Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD with Auto Brightness (Black)
